00049 
00056 SVG::Group& SVG::Group::operator<<(const Primitive& inPrimitive) 
00057 {
00058     if(inPrimitive.isDefined("id")) {
00059         // search for first instance of same id
00060         XML::Iterator lPos = getFirstChild();
00061         while(lPos && lPos->getAttribute("id") != inPrimitive.getAttribute("id")) ++lPos;
00062         if(lPos) *lPos = inPrimitive;
00063         else insertAsLastChild(new Node(inPrimitive));
00064     } else insertAsLastChild(new Node(inPrimitive));
00065     return *this;
00066 }
00067 
00069 void SVG::Group::clear() {eraseChildren();}
00070 
00072 unsigned SVG::Group::count() const {return getChildCount();}
